summary: A nightclub performer hires a naive chorus girl to become his new dance partner to make his former partner jealous and to prove he can make any partner a star.
cast: Judy Garland|Fred Astaire|Peter Lawford|Ann Miller|Jules Munshin|Clinton Sundberg|Richard Beavers|John Albright|Lola Albright|Don Anderson|Shirley Ballard|Norman S. Barker|Jimmy Bates|Hal Bell|Margaret Bert|Edward Biby|Ralph Brooks|Peter Chong|James Conaty|Dante DiPaolo|Jimmie Dodd|Dolores Donlon|Patricia Edwards|Harry Fox|Joel Friend|Sig Frohlich|June Gale|Robert Haines|Ruth Hall|Sam Harris|Hector and His Pals|Helene Heigh|Stuart Holmes|Shep Houghton|Marjorie Jackson|Patricia Jackson|Bob Jellison|Doris Kemper|Gail Langford|Joi Lansing|Jeni Le Gon|Nolan Leary|Carl M. Leviness|Laura Mason|Matt Mattox|Bert May|Frank Mayo|Philo McCullough|Frank McLure|Harold Miller|Howard M. Mitchell|George Noisom|Barry Norton|Robert Emmett O'Connor|Dick Paxton|Albert Pollet|Angi O. Poulos|Paul Power|Bobbie Priest|Jean Romer|Ralph Sanford|Sara Shane|Dick Simmons|Bert Spencer|Aline Towne|Dee Turnell|Benay Venuta|Johnny Walsh|Wilson Wood
title: Desfile de Pascua
